TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IApplicationPreloadManager

summary.span: Fornece métodos que o ASP.NET usa para invocar o recurso de pré-carregamento de aplicativo no IIS 7.0.

span.span: Provides methods that ASP.NET uses to invoke the application-preload feature in IIS 7.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetApplicationPreloadState (string context, string appId, bool enabled);

Public Sub SetApplicationPreloadState (context As String, appId As String, enabled As Boolean)
public: void SetApplicationPreloadState(System::String ^ context, System::String ^ appId, bool enabled);

span.span: The unique ID of the application.

param.name: enabled
param.span: para indicar se o aplicativo deve ser pré-carregado; caso contrário, .

span.span: to indicate that the application should be preloaded; otherwise, .

summary.span: Chamado por [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] para notificar o ASP.NET caso um aplicativo deva ser pré-carregado.

span.span: Called by [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] to notify ASP.NET whether an application should be preloaded.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetApplicationPreloadUtil([in]class System.Web.Hosting.IApplicationPreloadUtil preloadUtil) cil managed

param.name: preloadUtil
param.span: O identificador para uma interface não gerenciada em [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] que o ASP.NET chama para obter informações.

span.span: The handle to an unmanaged interface in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] that ASP.NET calls to get information.

summary.span: Chama [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] para obter as informações necessárias para pré-carregar um aplicativo.

span.span: Calls [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] to get information that is required in order to preload an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O IIS chama ASP.NET por meio dessa interface, fornecendo uma referência a um objeto que implementa o interface.IIS calls ASP.NET through this interface, supplying a reference to an object that implements the interface. O ASP.NET usa essa interface posteriormente para executar um retorno de chamada no IIS para obter informações de pré-carregamento de aplicativos individuais.ASP.NET uses that interface later to perform a callback into IIS to get preload information for individual applications.
